attributes.action: First and Second World Wars on the National curriculum
attributes.additional_details: The study of the First and Second World Wars should be mandatory for either first or secondary school students in order to educate them of the plight of the people involved and how peoples lives changed during both wars. It is an essential part of our history where many of our forebears  fought or contributed too in some way, of course, many of which either died or had their lives changed as a result. Please Share.
